## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have removed any console.log statements and debugging code

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] All property-based tests pass
- [ ] I have tested the changes in different browsers (if frontend)
- [ ] I have tested responsive design (if frontend)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the API documentation (if applicable)
- [ ] I have updated the README (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added/updated comments in the code

### Database

- [ ] I have created necessary database migrations
- [ ] I have tested migrations both up and down
- [ ] I have updated the Prisma schema (if applicable)
- [ ] I have run `npx prisma generate` after schema changes

### Security

- [ ] I have not exposed any sensitive information (API keys, passwords, etc.)
- [ ] I have validated all user inputs
- [ ] I have implemented proper authorization checks
- [ ] I have followed security best practices

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have not added unnecessary dependencies
- [ ] All new dependencies are from trusted sources
- [ ] I have updated package-lock.json (if dependencies changed)
